item.description:
Studio lighting will be: hair light will be straight on the top just behind the model, main light on the front left of the model and reflector will be on the right of the model.

Models with their favorite holiday dress (lighting will be modified base on the color of the model's dress).

Photographers: please bring some nice empty boxes with holiday wrapping paper (save the empty boxes from Christmas presents :) to the photoshoot so we could use them to decorate the background. Bring your tripod if you have one, in case you would like to use it.

MUA: Shelley

Models: Meghan, Susan, Amanda, Caitlin E.
item.name: Holiday Glamour Photoshoot on December 28th from 6:30 PM - 9:30 PM
